name: Shell Warrior
description:
Shell Warrior is an action rpg where you must save the world using just your shell!

------------------------

Features:

  • Unique combat system
  • 3 interesting bosses
  • An original soundtrack
  • Cool characters
  • Turtles.

------------------------
Controls:

Arrow keys - Move

Z - Interact

X - Shell

------------------------

Credits:

Programming: Nathcra

Graphics: Nathcra

Audio: Nathcra and Sk0nk

------------------------

PC Requirements:

Potato.

------------------------

Links and Stuff

Check out Sk0nk: https://sk0nk.itch.io/

Check out Nathcra (me) https://nathcra.itch.io/

------------------------

This game is released, yet it may have some bugs / errors. Please tell me about these so that I can fix these as soon as possible.

Lastly, thank you for playing this game! This game has taken me a very long time to make, so I would appreciate it if you gave feedback down in the comments.
